room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Fun! Really enjoyed playing here! Was not so easy that we breezed through, which was great! We had to work hard to figure it out. Will go back and do another adventure. Fun!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Our hostess, Ang, was awesome and very helpful! Our group of teenage girls had a blast and they escaped the island! Very challenging, would like to see better-decorated room though... a bit bare.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We had an awesome time! The room was full of surprises and the staff was so helpful and friendly! Can't wait to go back again!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: So much fun. Very friendly staff. If you're looking to do something different this is the place. Thanks again for the great experience

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: If you are looking for something new, fun and exciting to do, Breakout is the place to go! Whether its your friend group, coworkers, sports teams, or family, you're guaranteed to have a great time! The rooms are super challenging and the staff really go above and beyond to provide a great experience for everyone. I can't wait to go back and try the other rooms!
